name: Eva
dialogue: Hey guys, what's been on your minds lately? I've been thinking a lot about social justice and how we can make a difference.

name: Cathy
dialogue: Ah, great topic! I think it's amazing that people are actually taking a stand against inequality. We should totally organize a fundraiser to support the cause!

name: Ben
dialogue: Actually, I was reading an article about systemic racism and how it affects marginalized communities... it's really eye-opening.

name: David
dialogue: Yeah, I've been thinking about art as a way to bring people together and raise awareness. Maybe we could have an exhibit with local artists who focus on social justice?

name: Cathy
dialogue: Ooh, that sounds like a fantastic idea! We should invite the community to participate and show their support.

name: Eva
dialogue: Absolutely! And maybe we can even get some of our friends involved in the planning process. It'll be a fun way to make a difference together!

name: Ben
dialogue: Yeah, I'd love to help with the research aspect. We could gather data on how art has been used as a form of activism throughout history.

name: David
dialogue: Exactly! And we could also have workshops where people can learn about different techniques and mediums they can use to express themselves.

name: Cathy
dialogue: This is going to be so much fun! Let's get started!

name: Eva
dialogue: Agreed! I'll start reaching out to some of our friends who might be interested. Thanks, guys!
